txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Bright dust from the fell spirits surrounding the outpost at Kauppa-kohta. Deliver the items to Santtu at Kauppa-kohta.
'This will prove helpful to the Lossoth. Thank you.'
'Fell spirits of cold threaten our people, but they carry with them wonders that help our people. If you find any of these wonders bring them to me.'
Santtu at the Lossoth outpost of Kauppa-kohta awaits a delivery of bright dust.
Deliver the bright dust to Santtu at Kauppa-kohta in Forochel
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver bright dust from the fell spirits in the areas surrounding Kauppa-khota to Santtu, a Lossoth watching over the outpost.
Wanted: Bright dust from the fell spirits surrounding the outpost at Kauppa-kohta.
